5.title: Implicit presence of "While"
5.text:
The relation represented by "while" is implicit in the document.
Therefore, there isn't an actual alignment to "while".
So, you can either save it unaligned, or better yet, you can include it with the the part of the sentence coming after it ('starting "This bill....'), as this makes the most sense.
